ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can NESTLE速 CARNATION速 Sweetened Condensed Milk
36 pieces NESTLE速 BUTTERFINGER速 Bites Candy, chopped, divided
1 (12.25 ounce) jar caramel ice cream topping

cookingTips: Pierce warm cake with fork before drizzling condensed milk for absorption
Reserve some Butterfinger pieces for topping before layering
Keep whipped cream chilled until serving to maintain structure
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why should you pierce a warm cake before adding liquid toppings?
